ai:cl.c: A filter effect that plots the probability distribution of a quantum wave function.

ai:a.c: Render the effect to the target bitmap.
ai:a.p: ERR acDraw(*Object, DOUBLE X, DOUBLE Y, DOUBLE Width, DOUBLE Height)

ai:i.c: The X position of the region to be drawn.
The Y position of the region to be drawn.
The width of the region to be drawn.
The height of the region to be drawn.

ai:f.c: Assigns a pre-defined colourmap to the wave function.
The pixel resolution of the internally rendered wave function.
Multiplier that affects the scale of the plot.
Defines the colours to use for the wave function.
Returns an SVG compliant XML string that describes the effect.
